title: hello community
body:
I have a problem I was stuck aces in the match and not be given if the PC does not restart opinions reeling from what could it be?

Thank you xD

replies.body: I'm having a hard time understanding what's going on. I **think** what you're saying is you're freezing in-game and it's causing you to have to restart your PC in order to fix it. Is this correct?
